item.title: LM FUNDING AMERICA INC 10-K
item.description: LM FUNDING AMERICA INC, which is in the Finance Services [6199] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 31, 2022 had 27110 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 551 instances 2021 - 314 instances may - 253 instances stock - 224 instances business - 214 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
